item.title: Beeper
item.description: Lately I have been a bit obsessed with a communications protocol: Matrix. While I haven’t done too much with it directly. I did attempt to read the spec etc. However, it seems a bit … large for what it is. I have been using a couple Matrix clients and a couple matrix servers/services. Namely, Beeper is the primary one. I do enjoy Beeper, and support what Beeper is attempting to accomplish.
